text: Belgian Revenge (French:La revanche belge) is a 1922 Belgian silent film directed by Théo Bergerat and starring Fernand Crommelynck.Rège p.85 War drama about a woman hero, in love with a military engineer and coveted by his odious collaborationist "krauts" . She does not give in to the blackmail of a German who is lying to her about her fiancé's alleged death. The only remnant of the Belgian production of the Frenchman Bergerat. http://www.europeanfilmgateway.eu/detail/La%20revanche%20belge/crb::bf81f5b043d1249d0284a01b4b799c2a ==Cast== * Fernand Crommelynck as René Forgeois * Bella Darms as Hélène Forestier * Coursière as Ingénieur Forestier * Jimmy O'Kelly as Paul Forgeois * Varenne as Fritz Bauer == References == ==Bibliography== * Philippe Rège.
